page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN BIGGIN HILL.
page.content: The transport in Biggin Hill is not very good at all. If you don't have a car you have to take the bus. There are only two buses that run through Biggin Hill. One is private and the other is public. Each one comes every hour. The buses are not very reliable because of the traffic. The traffic in the valley is not that bad but getting into the valley is quite hard. In the morning the roads are busy because most people work outside Biggin Hill but it is quieter towards mid-day. The nearest railway station is in Bromley which you can get to by the public bus service.
